frame.name: Importing
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Importer</fen> receives <fen>Goods</fen> from an <fen>Exporting_area</fen>, across a boundary or border to a different area, the <fen>Importing_area</fen>. The <fen>Path</fen> along which the <fen>Goods</fen> pass may also be indicated.
<ex><fex name="Importer">The U.S.</fex> <t>imported</t> <fex name="Goods">some wheat</fex> <fex name="Time">in the period</fex>, although it exported about ten times as much.</ex> <ex><fex name="Importer">We</fex> <t>import</t> <fex name="Goods">most of the Tahitian seashells</fex> <fex name="Path">through Japan</fex>.</ex> <ex><t>Importation</t> <fex name="Goods">of wildlife</fex> has gotten more difficult. <fex name="Importer">INI</fex> <fex name="Importing_area">INI</fex> <fex name="Exporting_area">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Importer
FE.definition: <def-root>The conscious entity, generally a person, that brings the <fen>Goods</fen> into the <fen>Importing_area</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Goods
FE.definition: <def-root>The items of value whose location is changing.</def-root>

FE.name: Importing_area
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Importing_area</fen> is the place that the <fen>Goods</fen> end up as a result of motion.
</def-root>

FE.name: Exporting_area
FE.definition:
<def-root>The place where the <fen>Goods</fen> are initially, before the being moved.
</def-root>
